name: Zenith Traveler Portable Table
descr:
Features:
Hand crafted with high quality, durable hardwood. Easy to carry and setup!
Solid Hardwood, Two Piece Frame
Converts to Treatment Chair
Contoured Face and Dorsal Cushion
Headpiece Tilts and Raises
Manual Cervical Drop
Manual Dorsal Drop
Manual Lumbar Drop
Manual Pelvic Drop
Adjustable Ankle Rest
Attractive SENSATION (Naugahyde) Upholstery
Face Paper Toweling & Dispenser
Table Heights- 18", 20", 22", or 24"
Table Length 66”
Table Width 19”
